What we do

Our strength lies in combining different fields to drive innovation and efficiency.

Custom IT Solutions

We turn your ideas into actionable and measurable concepts, carefully analyzing your vision and laying the base for a successful future implementation.

Frontend

We design and implement intuitive and visually appealing user interfaces, ensuring seamless user experiences across platforms.

Backend

We build robust and scalable server-side solutions to support your applications with secure and efficient processing.

Data / Visualization

We transform complex data into insightful and interactive visual representations to enhance decision-making processes.

Web Development

We develop responsive and feature-rich websites tailored to your business needs and goals.

Mobile Development

We create user-friendly and high-performing mobile applications for Android and iOS platforms.

UX / UI

We craft engaging and user-centric designs that prioritize usability and aesthetic appeal.

Modules / Microservices

We specialize in modular architectures and microservices to enhance scalability and maintainability.

AI

We harness the power of artificial intelligence for you to create smart and adaptive solutions.

Individual solutions

Special cases need flexible solutions.

Startup success:
Launching with SETBASE

Get started

Are you a startup with a need for software or product development in general? SETBASE propels your success. Together we analyze what your vision requiers and how we can move towards it as fast as possible. We keep it simple, transparent and goal oriented.

Our effeort for sucess Together:

We allow startups to quickly get what they need without investing extensive time and resources.
The effort is on us, the sucess we enjoy togehter. Share your requirements with us and discover how easy it is to get the technology your startup needs.

Idea factory:
Is it possible? Is it a good idea?

Innovation:

Sometimes there is an idea worth exploring - be it conceptionally or even with a prototyple or MVP.
Together we run through your vision, combine our expertise and connections to various industries and experts with your vision and expertise to find innovative solutions together.

Let's try:

Sometimes the only way to find out is to go forward and create something. We keep it simple, easy, with no overhead and enable you to try what you are envisioning. Present the result to convince or to find out - having something at hand is the best way to to do it.
